role.argrole: entity arg0 takes away with it

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VP (VV 带走) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (NP (NN 青春)) (PU 、) (NP (NN 理想)) (PU 、) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 纯洁))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 爱) )) (PU ，) (NP (ADVP (AD 甚至)) (NP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 挚爱) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 亲人) ))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 却)) (VP (VV 留下) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 许多)) (NP (NP (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 敢) (VP (VV 碰触) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 伤口) )) (PU 、) (NP (CP (WHNP-4 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 堪) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 回首) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-4))))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 憾恨) ))))))))
example.arg: 青春 、 理想 、 *OP* *T*-1 纯洁 的 爱 ， 甚至 *OP* *pro* 挚爱 *T*-2 的 亲人
